text: aw tushbh hal fariq akhar min almunafiqin yuzhir lahum alhaqu tart, wyshkwn fih taratan akhra, hal jamaeat yamshun fi alera', fynsb ealayhim mtr shdyd, tsahbh zulumat baeduha fawq bed, mae qasf alred, wlmean albrq, walswaeq almhrqt, alty tjelhm min shdt alhwl ydewn 'asabieahum fi adhanhm; khwfana min alhlak. wallah taealaa muhit bialkafirin la yfwtwnh wala yejzwnh
